name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: An introductory course in Chemistry covering topics such as the periodic table, chemical reactions, and stoichiometry.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: A course focusing on the study of organic compounds and reactions.

name: Chemical Kinetics and Thermodynamics
description: A course focusing on the study of chemical kinetics and thermodynamics.

name: Biochemistry
description: A course focusing on the study of biochemical processes.
